origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketAnalysisAPI.get_competitive_report', 'description': 'This function provides a competitive analysis report based on the market type and time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'marketType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of market, e.g., mobile_payments, e-commerce.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the analysis, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The competitive analysis report for the specified market and time frame.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketAnalysisAPI.get_competitive_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'marketType'是'mobile_payments', 'timeFrame'是'last_year'.
